title: U.S. college students average study hours , by major 2011
yAxis: Number of hours spent studying per week
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of hours spent studying per week for 29 number of Months.
The Number of hours spent studying per week is appeared to be the highest at Month Architecture and lowest at Month Speech.
The lowest value at Month Speech is 2.19x times less than the highest value at Architecture.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of hours spent studying per week for 29 number of Months.
The maximum Number of hours spent studying per week 23.7 is found at Month Architecture and the minimum is found at Speech where Month is 10.8.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of hours spent studying per week for 29 number of Months.
The Number of hours spent studying per week is appeared to be the highest at Month Architecture and lowest at Month Speech.
The lowest value at Month Speech is 2.19x times less than the highest value at Architecture.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of hours spent studying per week in the y axis.
Month Architecture has the highest Number of hours spent studying per week and Speech has the lowest Number of hours spent studying per week.
Second maximum Number of hours spent studying per week is found at Month Chemical Engineering.
The highest Month Architecture has 12.9 more Number of hours spent studying per week than the lowest Month Speech.
Number of hours spent studying per week at Month Architecture is 23.7 , second place is Chemical Engineering at 21.6, and thirdly is Physics at 19.7.
The Number of hours spent studying per week has reduced over the past 29 Months.
Month Theater, and Anthropology have the same Number of hours spent studying per week.
The lowest value 10.8 at Speech is almost 1.53 times smaller than the average value 15.47.
